description:
The House has several methods of training DS. Sometimes the eastern method can be refreshing after all Shibari is being practiced here. Master of the house Nick Moretti toughens up his boy Jason Miller with some simple bamboo. Begging for more, Jason is suspended and hot wax drips over his bound body. Nick brings up the intensity and flogs the suspended boy. But it's not over yet, Nick pulls out the single tail whip and works on Jason's back and ass. When Jason's ass is nice and red, Nick fucks it until it screams for mercy.
PS: My apology for bastardizing the pronunciation of Bushido.
title: Bushido
